name: Évodév Technologies Inc.
technology: Python, JS, SQL Alchemy,  MySql, Microsoft Graph API, Docker, Flutter, Nuxt.js
summary: Developed and maintained cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter, integrated with Firebase and SQLite for efficient data handling. name: Cold Chain Science Enterprice

summary: Here I got to play with a modern stack — Python, FastAPI, Nuxt.js, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and even Docker. Basically, I made sure things ran fast and looked good. Also, worked with Tailwind CSS and implemented Postgres as the database

name: Brainvire Infotech Pvt. Ltd.
technology: Python, Odoo, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Docker, XML, JavaScript
summary: I spent most of my time building out customer-specific features in Python and making the system more modular so it could scale better.
